chunks.cleaned_english_translation: About Falchalino, a student of Ludovicus. Falchalinus, who was also a master of schools, had become well-established in his teachings. He worked with Franconius, the scholar of Saint Lambert, on projects about the squaring of the circle and the fasts of the Four Seasons.
chunks.original_latin:
De Falchalino Ludovici
discipulo. Falchalinus etiam scholarum magister, ejus
coaluerat disciplinis. Iste Franconi scholastico
 Sancti Lamberti in opusculis de quadratura circuli,
et de jejuniis Quatuor temporum cooperatus est.
